TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ClientAccessTokenType extends System.Enum

summary.span: Define el tipo de token de acceso de cliente.

span.span: Defines the type of client access token.

summary.span: El (enumeración) es aplicable para los clientes que estén destinados a Exchange Online y versiones de Exchange a partir de Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The enumeration is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ClientAccessTokenType CallerIdentity = int32(0)

summary.span: La identidad del autor de la llamada.
El campo CallerIdentity es aplicable para los clientes que estén destinados a Exchange Online y versiones de Exchange a partir de Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The CallerIdentity field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ClientAccessTokenType ExtensionCallback = int32(1)

summary.span: Una referencia a una devolución de llamada de extensión del tipo de token de acceso cliente.

span.span: A reference to a client access token type extension callback.

summary.span: El campo ExtensionCallback es aplicable para los clientes que estén destinados a Exchange Online y versiones de Exchange a partir de Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The ExtensionCallback field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ClientAccessTokenType ScopedToken = int32(2)

summary.span: Un token de acceso con un ámbito limitado, conceder acceso sólo a los elementos especificados en el (propiedad). El campo ScopedToken es aplicable para los clientes que estén destinados a Exchange Online y versiones de Exchange a partir de 2013SP1 de Exchange Server.

span.span: An access token with a limited scope, granting access only to the items specified in the property.The ScopedToken field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013SP1.
